title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competencies: Blended Learning Environment for Mathematics Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can demonstrate learning autonomy with attendance and assignment submission rates exceeding 90%
Students can achieve over 30% improvement in individual math competencies through diagnostic assessments within the learning platform
Students can perform five or more collaborative interactions through peer assessments and group projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
